    forestly

    The goal of forestly is to …

    Installation

    You can install the released version of forestly from CRAN with:

    install.packages("forestly")

    And the development version from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("elong0527/forestly")

    Resources:

    • R package: https://r-pkgs.org/whole-game.html
    • Version control (github): https://rstudio.com/resources/webinars/managing-part-2-github-and-rstudio/
    • reactable R package: https://glin.github.io/reactable/articles/examples.html
    • plotly R package: https://plotly-r.com/

    Onboarding:

    • Onbording: https://elong0527.github.io/forestly/articles/onboarding.html
    • Example: https://elong0527.github.io/forestly/articles/example.html
